amendatorysection.para: It is the intent of the Legislature to appropriate one million dollars each fiscal year for FY2014-15 to FY2017-18 from funds available to the federal Temporary Assistance for Needy Families program, 42 U.S.C. 601 et seq., as such sections existed on January 1, 2013, to carry out sections 48-3101 to 48-3106. No more than ten percent of the funds appropriated to carry out sections 48-3101 to 48-3106 shall be used for administrative costs. Administrative cost shall not be defined to include cost for service delivery. Any of such funds which are unexpended on June 30, 2018, shall lapse to the federal Temporary Assistance for Needy Families program on such date.
